assignments.description: Assignment of recordId to the Subsidiary Relation of this special relationship
assignments.name: Assign_Account_Record_ID_to_varR_Relationship
assignments.label: Assign Account Record ID to varR_Relationship

assignments.description: Assign Created or Selected Person Account as Primary Relation on New Relationship variable
assignments.name: Assign_Person_Account_As_Primary_Relation
assignments.label: Assign Person Account As Primary Relation

assignments.description: Assign necessary values for record variable
assignments.name: Assign_values_to_new_Account_Contact_Relationship_variable
assignments.label: Assign Values to new Account Contact Relationship variable

assignments.description: Error Message to show on the current/existing relationship with possibly same combination between accounts with same start date
assignments.name: Assignment_Of_Error_Message_In_Case_Of_Duplicate
assignments.label: Assignment Of Error Message In Case Of Duplicate

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_Account' if the Element fails.

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_Relationships' if the Element fails.

decisions.description: In case a new person account needs to be created for this relationship
decisions.name: Create_New_PersonAccount
decisions.label: Create New PersonAccount

decisions.description: To determine if the current special relationships should be showed in a screen
decisions.name: Existing_Special_Relationships_To_Show
decisions.label: Existing Special Relationships To Show

Flow.description: Manage or create a special relationship between Accounts
Flow.interviewLabel: Screen Flow - Create New Special Relationship {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Screen Flow - Create New Special Relationship

recordCreates.description: Create the new record based on the filled variable
recordCreates.name: Create_Relationship
recordCreates.label: Relationship

recordLookups.description: Get the selected person account record of the subflow or the selected person account in the screen after database search
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Account

recordLookups.description: Collecting current special relationship (both active and inactive)
recordLookups.name: Get_Relationships
recordLookups.label: Relationships

recordRollbacks.description: If the Flow Errors we don't want to stop half way in the process. The whole process should roll back and run again.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecords
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Records

screens.description: Screen to show the existing special relationship (active and inactive)
screens.name: Screen_Current_Special_Relationships
screens.label: Screen Current Special Relationships

fields.name: Txt_DisplayCheckDuplicates
fields.fieldText: It seems that the combination between the persons has already been made with the same start date. Creating a new relationship is therefore not possible. Check the list below.

value.stringValue: [{"apiName":"Primary_Account_Full_Name__c","guid":"column-e9fe","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.PrimaryRelation}","wrapText":true,"order":0,"label":"Primary Account Full Name","type":"customRichText"},{"apiName":"Primary_Relation_Name__c","guid":"column-2308","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.RoleRelation}","wrapText":true,"order":1,"label":"Primary Relation Name","type":"customRichText"},{"apiName":"Subsidiary_Account_Full_Name__c","guid":"column-fe53","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.SubsidiaryRelation}","wrapText":true,"order":2,"label":"Subsidiary Account Full Name","type":"customRichText"},{"apiName":"Active__c","guid":"column-938d","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.Active}","wrapText":true,"order":3,"label":"Active","type":"boolean"},{"apiName":"Start_Date__c","guid":"column-2282","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.StartDate}","wrapText":true,"order":4,"label":"Start Date","type":"date-local"},{"apiName":"End_Date__c","guid":"column-1b3a","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"{!$Label.EndDate}","wrapText":true,"order":5,"label":"End Date","type":"date-local"}]

fields.fieldText: No results found.

fields.name: Txt_FoundResults
